rulesStrings.li: physical_description_root->Rooted in acoustic instruments and simple storytelling, this record favors warmth and intimacy.
physical_description_root->Honest lyrics and gentle arrangements support its close, human feeling.
r_middle_sentence_1->Acoustic players and honest vocals keep the production warm.
r_middle_sentence_2->Simple arrangements foreground melody and narrative.
r_middle_sentence_3->The record feels rooted in place and tradition.
r_middle_sentence_4->Stories are told plainly with ornamentation kept spare.
r_middle_sentence_5->Performance imperfections enhance the human quality.
r_middle_sentence_6->Instrumentation favors strings, woodwinds and hand percussion.
